description: A traveller who appeared in Lukuss from out of thin air. Ran first takes Yoshii to the village of Gabe. Who he is, and for what purpose he has come to Lukuss, is still a mystery. However, he may be more than what his gentle demeanour indicates. A gun stashed in his backpack, among other things, suggests a foreboding of trouble.
name: Yoshii Kazuho
